title: Activist Hedge Fund Starboard Has Big Stake in Huntsman
sub_head: Starboard holds a more-than-8% stake in the chemicals producer
body:
Activist hedge fund Starboard Value LP has a more-than-8% stake in Huntsman Corp. and plans to agitate for change at the chemicals producer, according to people familiar with the matter.
Huntsman has a market value of roughly $6.3 billion, making Starboardâ€™s stake worth around $500 million or more.
